Mailing Address: c/o Clinical Prevention Services, STI/HIV Control655 12th Ave WVancouver, BC     V5Z 4R4
Service Details: - Provides sexual health information and resources for the public, including a sexual health services finder for BC- Individuals can ask a question through the website or chat online with a sexual health nurse- Individuals can register to receive STI testing and Hepatitis / HPV vaccine reminders by email or text- Offers a blog for health care providers with regular updates on STI trends, research and programs in BC
Languages: English ; Some resources are available in the following languages: Spanish, Punjabi, Simplified and Traditional Chinese, French, Korean, Japanese, Vietnamese, Russian, Somali and Arabic
